content:
Artillerymen 47 of the separate mechanized brigade stopped the enemy BMP-3 in motion, hitting the first shot.

Video work of artillerymenPublishedThe Ministry of Defense on the social network H.

The hostile armored vehicle was destroyed by the shot of the Paladin self -propelled artillery installation provided by Western partners.

The Paladin SAU in action: Artillerymen 47 of the separate mechanized brigade stopped the enemy BMP-3 in motion, from the first shot.

The disposable armored vehicles continue to go to the battlefield, and Ukrainian steel warriors minut all hostile "boxes".

Battle continues!pic.twitter.com/Cz0QIhZsMD

- the General Staff of the Armed Forces (@generalstaffua)March 30, 2024

"The disposable armored vehicles continue to go to the battlefield, and Ukrainian steel warriors minute all hostile" boxes "," the Defense Ministry added.

As reported by the Armyinform, the military of the Russian Federation in Gorlovsky directionThey took their artilleryto the maximum distance to defend their defenders from Ukrainian drones.
title: Sau Paadin one shot destroyed the enemy BMP-3
description: The video of the artillerymen was posted by the Ministry of Defense on the social network H.
author: Army Inform
